about_the_game:
The forces of Chaos come, Darkness covers the fabric of the universe, enslaving all life, turning to its side. Heroes from different worlds, with different abilities and worldviews, must unite on the battlefield for a decisive battle with the forces of the Dark Gods!

Realms of Darkness is mix between MOBA and RTS game in grimdark setting where a player controls one hero and, in cooperation with his team, he must defeat the same players in another team.

In this game you will have to apply all your strategic planning skills, correctly distributing the construction and defense resources of the base, as well as participating in attacks on the enemy base.

The main objective of the game is, in cooperation with other players, to destroy the enemie's shrine.

Features

Constructions.
Defense planning and attacks on the enemy base.
Unique characters with unique abilities with their separately assigned roles.
Unique items to help you defeat the enemy.

name: Realms of Darkness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. AMD Athlon II and analogs.
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities and with 1GB memory and above.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 analogs and above.
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: From GTX 660 analogs and above.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: Mix of realtime Strategy and MOBA in grimdark setting.
